title: Lesson 78
paragraph: This lesson focuses on poverty and humility, highlighting meager, austere, and frugal lifestyles.

words.meaning: without the basic necessities of life
words.example: The family was destitute after the flood.

words.meaning: made poor or deprived of wealth

words.example: He survived on a meager income.

words.meaning: unassuming in the estimation of one’s abilities or achievements
words.example: She was modest about her accomplishments.

words.meaning: severe or strict in manner or attitude; simple and unadorned
words.example: The monks led an austere life.
He lived an ascetic life in the mountains.

words.meaning: economical in the use of resources
words.example: They led a frugal lifestyle to save money.

words.japaneseMeaning: 極度に貧しい、困窮した
words.example: The penurious artist struggled to buy supplies.

words.meaning: not attempting to impress others with an appearance of greater importance
words.example: His unpretentious manner made him approachable.
